text: Ellen M. Travolta (born October 6, 1939) is an American actress. She is known for playing Louisa Arcola Delvecchio in Happy Days and Joanie Loves Chachi. She also played Lillian in Charles in Charge. Her brother is actor John Travolta. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Englewood, New Jersey
title: Ellen Travolta
